author: aadamchik
msg: CAY-1515 runtime relationships are not initialized

author: thobbs
msg: Stopped river.home from being overriden so that the correct java-savy path can be used from the ../build.properties file.  This helps more jtreg tests pass (on Windows), specifically those that use the HTTPD class.

author: thobbs
msg: Added additional notes on running the jtreg tests and also use of forward rather than back slashes.

author: cmpilato
msg: (print_update_summary): Convert notification path to an abspath
before removing the $CWD prefix.  This should be the same behavior

author: antelder
msg: Add a build profile to build all thats necessary for the all distro as quickly as possible, so no tests get run, intended mainly for Hudson to try to get some nightly builds published more often
